featured.text: These people believe that if they smoke “light” cigarettes with less nicotine, they will not get cancer.
More than two-thirds believe that it is only the nicotine in cigarettes rather than the other chemicals that cause cancer.

definition.zh_def: 尼古丁：一種存在於煙草中的生物鹼，具有成癮性，常用於吸煙和其他煙草產品。
definition.en_def: Nicotine: A highly addictive alkaloid found in tobacco, commonly used in smoking and other tobacco products.
definition.example: Many people struggle to quit smoking because of the addictive nature of nicotine.
